p: A preplanned primary endpoint sensitivity analysis was done in the intention-to-treat (ITT) population including all eligible patients who received at least one cycle of treatment; patients with no end-of-treatment-CT assessment were counted as non-responders. A second preplanned primary endpoint sensitivity analysis was done as treated in the per-protocol population defined as all patients who received the planned number of cycles and were either assessable by CT or had reported clinical progression at the end of treatment.
